meanings.sent1: After losing his original certificate, he had to go through reregistrations at the office.
meanings.sent2: Online reregistrations for the course will open next week.
meanings.sent3: The reregistrations for the marathon were so popular that they had to extend the deadline.
meanings.sent4: Her frequent reregistrations for various events showed her enthusiasm for new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The endless paperwork for reregistrations seemed never-ending and tedious.

meanings.definition: The process of signing up again.
meanings.sent1: Students completed their reregistrations for the next semester with ease.
meanings.sent2: The reregistrations for the loyalty program were simple and quick.
meanings.sent3: His reregistrations for the club made him feel like a returning member of a secret society.
meanings.sent4: The reregistrations flooded in after the announcement of the new benefits.
meanings.sent5: The reregistrations after the system update caused some confusion among users.

meanings.sent1: Her reregistrations in the dance class brought back memories of her childhood.
meanings.sent2: The reregistrations for the workshop were higher than expected.
meanings.sent3: The reregistrations for the study group made him feel like a dedicated student.
meanings.sent4: The sudden increase in reregistrations surprised the administration.
meanings.sent5: His reregistrations in the fitness program motivated him to stay healthy.
